author: Beth Mole
title: Who lives, who dies? Guidelines for hospitals in the time of COVID-19
description: These are choices no doctor wants to make. But they may soon be a reality.
content: Enlarge/ NEW YORK, NY - MARCH 20: Doctors test hospital staff with flu-like symptoms for COVID-19 at St. Barnabas hospital on March 20, 2020, in New York City. St. Barnabas hospital in the Bronx set-up tents to triage possible COVID-19 patients outside before… [+8066 chars]
